course_name: Physiotherapy Specialties: Musculoskeletal IIB (Cervical and Thoracic Spine)
description: This course will provide students with knowledge & understanding of the musculoskeletal pathologies of the cervical & thoracic spines & craniomandibular region, the physical manifestations of cervical, thoracic & upper quadrant disorders, differentiation of cervical versus other origins of condition such as headache, dizziness & face pain, the clinical reasoning process in clinical assessment & diagnosis, physiotherapy treatment options, rationales & treatment selection.
prerequisites: All Year One and Year Two courses for the BPhty (Hons) program plus PHTY3110, PHTY3130, PHTY3140, HRSS3100
